name: Kid Pix Presentation
summary: Presentation created with Kid Pix, an artistic creation program for kids; contains slides with various pictures and objects that can be played back as a slide show; can be exported from Kid Pix by selecting the "SlideShow To Go" option.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: The Learning Company Kid Pix Deluxe
